briefdescription.para: Auto-dispatch GEMV based on available SIMD.

briefdescription.para: Backward pass: compute input gradient (scalar reference)

parameterdescription.para: Weight matrix in FP16 format [M x K]

memberdef.argsstring: (float *y, const uint16_t *W, const float *x, int M, int K)
memberdef.name: gemv_f16_ref

briefdescription.para: Matrix-vector multiply with FP16 weights (scalar reference)

parameterdescription.para: Weight matrix in FP16 [M x K]

detaileddescription.para:
Implements matrix multiplication where:
Weights: FP16 (IEEE half-precision, used by vision encoders)
Activations: FP32
Output: FP32
Used for multimodal projection layers (mmproj-*.gguf files).
